title: Shale Driller Expand Energy Surges as Traders Eye Ohio Plant
description: Expand Energy Corp. rose the most in a month, making it one of Friday’s best performers in the S&P 500, on expectations the shale driller will benefit from a giant new natural gas-fired power plant planned in Ohio.
content: Expand Energy Corp. rose the most in a month, making it one of Friday’s best performers in the S&P 500, on expectations the shale driller will benefit from a giant new natural gas-fired power plant planned in Ohio.
